ai-mil3.2.1:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, is he who gives a reference to the royal bull elephant?”
ai-mil3.2.1:2.2_0: “What do you think, great king? When you’re a youth, a little baby boy?”
ai-mil3.2.1:2.3_0: “Sir, I wasn’t a little baby boy because I was a young man.”
ai-mil3.2.1:2.4_0: “In that case, great king, there will be no mother or father, or teacher’s father.
ai-mil3.2.1:2.5_0: But then, great king, is there another swiftly knowing your mother and father, your mother and father, your parents, your calves, your mother and father, your tender hands and children, and your calves shall be one swiftly pressed?”
ai-mil3.2.1:2.9_0: “Great king, I was a youth, young, newly to you. I was lived in this way all of them.”
ai-mil3.2.1:3.2_0: “Great king, what kind of person would fall in a lamp of oil?”
ai-mil3.2.1:3.3_0: “Yes, sir, I wish to offer up all night.”
ai-mil3.2.1:3.4_0: “Great king, what’s the first watch of the night? What’s the flame?”
ai-mil3.2.1:3.6_0: “The middle watch of the night has arrived,”
ai-mil3.2.1:3.8_0: “Great king, was the first vehicle that was the middle watch of the night, the very day, and the middle watch of the night for me?”
ai-mil3.2.1:3.9_0: “No, sir, it isn’t due to all nights.”
ai-mil3.2.1:3.10_0: “In the same way, great king, the one who understands the Dhamma of the Dhamma that arises isn’t previously ceases, as one wouldn’t get previously ceases.”
ai-mil3.2.1:4.2_0: “Great king, if a monk is depressed in swapping the holes, swallows, and catching it’s the right size, it would be right to say, great king, that is the nine thing!”
ai-mil3.2.1:4.3_0: “But, sir, it isn’t because of all this.”
ai-mil3.2.1:4.4_0: “In the same way, great king, the one who understands the Dhamma of the Dhamma that arises isn’t previously ceases, as one wouldn’t get previously ceases.”
ai-mil3.2.1:6.1_0: the first (amonge) Dhamma is the first wish:
